description: Jiu-Jitsu Saint-Lambert is an upcoming school for kids and adult beginners.
sub_text: We are currently gauging interest and looking for locations to run our classes. If you would like to be kept up-to-date, please sign up to our mailing list using the form.
meta_desc: Jiu-Jitsu Saint-Lambert is a Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu club located in Saint-Lambert, Québec.
bio: <1>Tetsuro started training Brazilian jiu-jitsu in 2016 and has been hooked ever since. His goal is to share his love of the sport to kids and adults in the neighbourhood.</1> <1>Tetsuro received his purple belt from Val Astraverkhau at <2>Mizu Studio</2> in 2022 and continues to train regularly.</1>
location_desc: Classes will take place in the lower hall of the Christian Education Centre, located at 485 av. Birch.
